Products.name: Modern Chair
Products.description: This is simple chair with modern design and looks to make your home look more stylist. It has different colors and pattern to suit your needs.

Products.name: Minimalistic Plant Plot
Products.description: This plot is suitable to decorate your bathroom.There is a small hole in the bottom of the pot, so that water can flow through the soil and keep your plants healthy. The pot will make a lovely display of herbs on a kitchen windowsill or for mini cactus or succulents in the bathroom.
